Exaggerate: The claim in the Facebook post exaggerates by stating that Joe Biden said he never met with Hunter and the Burisma CEO, when he did not mention Burisma or the CEO in the "60 Minutes" interview.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided in the Facebook post to substantiate the assertion that Joe Biden met with both Hunter and the Burisma CEO.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the photo of Joe and Hunter Biden with two other men on a golf course proves that Joe Biden met with both Hunter and the Burisma CEO, when there is no evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the photo shows Joe and Hunter Biden with two other men, but not the Burisma CEO or any evidence of a meeting between Joe Biden and the Burisma CEO.
